name: staunchness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact or quality of being strongly loyal in supporting a person, organization, or set of beliefs or opinions: I admire her staunchness and fidelity. With a staunchness imbued in them since childhood, the family just carried on. See
staunch
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a tower of staunchness in the face of civil and religious threats. I admire the resilience, the staunchness, the sheer determination, and courage of the people do this job week in week out.I cannot emphasize too strongly the staunchness of his attitude in discussing these matters.
